name: A Mirage of Home
description:
... is a horror puzzle game in which you wake up in a strange apartment with nothing but your phone in your hand.
Use your phone's selfie camera to discover secrets and clues invisible to the naked eye.

____________________________________________________________________

THE STORY Something bad happened here. Wherever you look you find traces of a gruesome event.  Rituals. Runes. Blood. It's not safe here. You  need to get out. Now.

_____________________________________________________________________

GAMEPLAY A Mirage of Home is a first-person horror/escape room/puzzle game where your goal is to esacpe the strange apartment you find yourself in. Your trusty phone and its selfie camera are your only tools to help you find out what happened, and to get out.The game has multiple endings.
